statements: SELECT * FROM pricing_information;
SELECT product_id, price FROM pricing_information WHERE market_trend = 'Up';
SELECT product_id, price, market_trend FROM pricing_information WHERE price > 100;
SELECT product_id, market_trend FROM pricing_information WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM pricing_information ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM pricing_information WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT product_id, price, market_trend FROM pricing_information WHERE market_trend = 'Upcoming' ORDER BY price ASC, last_updated DESC;
SELECT product_id, market_trend, price FROM pricing_information WHERE market_trend IN ('Trending', 'Popular') ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT product_id, price, market_trend FROM pricing_information WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 150 ORDER BY price DESC, last_updated ASC;
SELECT product_id, price, market_trend, last_updated FROM pricing_information WHERE market_trend = 'Stable' AND last_updated > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY market_trend ASC, product_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_trends;
SELECT product_id, price FROM market_trends WHERE market_demand > 100;
SELECT strategy_name, formula FROM pricing_strategies;
SELECT * FROM market_trends WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_id, market_demand FROM market_trends WHERE market_demand < 50;
SELECT product_id, price, market_demand FROM market_trends WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY market_demand DESC, price ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name FROM pricing_strategies WHERE formula LIKE '%price%' ORDER BY strategy_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, AVG(price) AS avg_price, SUM(market_demand) AS total_demand FROM market_trends GROUP BY product_id HAVING AVG(price) > 50 ORDER BY avg_price DESC;
SELECT product_id, price, market_demand FROM market_trends WHERE product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM pricing_strategies WHERE strategy_name = 'Premium' ORDER BY product_id) ORDER BY product_id ASC;

SELECT strategy_id, COUNT(strategy_id) AS strategy_count, SUM(LENGTH(formula)) AS total_formula_length FROM pricing_strategies GROUP BY strategy_id HAVING SUM(LENGTH(formula)) > 100 ORDER BY strategy_count DESC;
SELECT product_id, price, market_trend FROM PricingInformation;
SELECT market_trend, price, product_id FROM PricingInformation;
SELECT * FROM PricingInformation WHERE product_id = 101;
SELECT trend_id, trend_name, trend_description FROM MarketTrends;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_details, strategy_id FROM PricingStrategies;
SELECT product_id, price, market_trend FROM PricingInformation;
SELECT * FROM PricingInformation JOIN MarketTrends ON PricingInformation.market_trend = MarketTrends.trend_name;
SELECT product_id, price FROM PricingInformation WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_details FROM PricingStrategies WHERE strategy_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT product_id, price, market_trend FROM PricingInformation WHERE market_trend LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM pricing_strategy;
SELECT strategy_name, market_trend FROM pricing_strategy WHERE strategy_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_category, current_price FROM product WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description, market_trend FROM pricing_strategy WHERE market_trend = 'positive';
SELECT product_name, current_price, last_updated FROM product WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM pricing_strategy WHERE strategy_id = 1;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM pricing_strategy ORDER BY strategy_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM pricing_history WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY updated_at ASC;
SELECT p.*, h.price FROM product p JOIN pricing_history h ON p.product_id = h.product_id WHERE p.product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, base_price, current_price, last_updated FROM product WHERE last_updated BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM pricing_strategy;
SELECT product_id, base_price FROM pricing_strategy WHERE market_demand > 100;
SELECT product_id, dynamic_price FROM pricing_strategy ORDER BY dynamic_price DESC;
SELECT product_id, base_price, market_demand FROM pricing_strategy WHERE base_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM pricing_history WHERE date_updated >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM pricing_strategy ORDER BY product_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, category, brand FROM product WHERE brand = 'Brand XYZ' AND category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_id, base_price, market_demand FROM pricing_strategy WHERE market_demand > 100 ORDER BY base_price ASC, product_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM market_trend WHERE trend_effect BETWEEN 10.00 AND 20.00 ORDER BY trend_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, action_type, action_date FROM user_activity ORDER BY action_date DESC LIMIT 5;
